name: Quagsire
flavorText:
This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.

previous.name: Wooper
previous.flavorText:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

next.name: Espeon

It uses the fine
hair that covers
its body to sense air currents and
predict its ene­
my's actions.

pokemon.name: Clodsire
pokemon.flavorText: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.
